t: Infineon Technologies AG Company Profile - Infineon Technologies AG Overview - GlobalData
s: Infineon Technologies AG (Infineon) is a manufacturer and provider of semiconductor products and solutions. It designs, develops, manufactures, and markets application-specific ICs, microcontrollers, radio frequency, sensors, interfaces, and transistor products.
